NetworkAdapter.description: The NetworkAdapter schema represents a physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.
NetworkAdapter.longDescription: This resource shall represent a physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network in a Redfish implementation.

title: #NetworkAdapter.NetworkAdapter
